entry.title: $1895 // **NO FEE, MUST SEE**
entry.content:
** NO FEE!! LARGE ONE BEDROOM **

When a studio is typically to small for you and you are looking for a separate feel with an entertainment area, to relax and rewind, this is the perfect unit for you!! You'll have a full kitchen, and a full bath! If you like the sun, you will also have a large window shinning in on those hardwood floors!

*You will be steps away from the subway line*

Come to the Upper East Side, and make this 1BR yours today! Contact me for viewings before its too late!!
516-474-7099

entry.title: $2335 // Laundry Building/2 Prime BR in Upper East Side Manhattan
entry.content:
Gut Renovated 2 bedroom apartment. This apartment features a true Queen size Bedrooms, Drenched in Natural Sunlight. High Ceilings and Hardwood Floors throughout the apartment, Open style kitchen with modern SS appliances . Marble Bathroom. A MUST SEE APARTMENT.

Apartment is close to Subway: 4/5/6 Q

Location is Amazing . One of the most affluent neighborhoods in New York City. Lined to the east by Central Park, the cities largest green space. Home to the Mayor, World class museums (Museum Mile), lively restaurants, shopping and brunch spots.

Why wouldn't you live in this amazing neighborhood?
Renovated;
Modern kitchen;
Hardwood floors;
Very light Apartment;
Natural Sunlight.

This Deal Wont Last. Call me Today: 3473578346
